text: bitikidu ālahi ke’inanite yetebik’ak’a newi፡፡ lebarīyawochumi kehidetini āyiwedimi፡፡ bitameseginumi፤ irisuni yiwedilachiḫwali፡፡ maninyayitumi ḫat’ī’atini teshekamī nefisi yelēlayituni ḫat’ī’ati ātishekemimi፡፡ kezīyami memeleshachihu wede gētachihu newi፡፡ tišeruti yeneberachihutinimi yinegirachiḫwali፡፡ irisu belibochi wisit’i yalutini ‘āwak’ī newina፡፡
